cart_checkout_info: Shipping, taxes, and discount codes calculated at checkout
cart_checkout_terms: By completing your purchase, you agree to these Terms of Sale

cart_low_stock_warning: Some items are low in stock
cart_mismatch_message: We detected a mismatch between your cart data. The cart has been reset.
cart_terms_agreement: By proceeding, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
checkout_auth_required: Please sign in or create an account to continue checkout
checkout_email_description: We'll use your email for order updates and shipping information.
checkout_email_usage_hint: Your email will be used for order confirmation and delivery updates only.
checkout_error_guest: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.
checkout_login_description: Sign in to your account for a faster checkout process.
checkout_payment_placeholder: You'll be able to enter your payment details on the next step.

checkout_secure_transaction: This is a secure, encrypted transaction
checkout_shipping_placeholder: You'll be able to enter your shipping details on the next step.
checkout_sign_in_benefits: Sign in to access your saved addresses, track your order history, and enjoy a smoother checkout experience
checkout_sign_in_title: Sign in for a faster checkout
customizable_description: Hot-swappable switches for your perfect feel
email_confirmation_text: We'll send your order confirmation here
error_add_to_cart_failed: Failed to add item to cart
error_check_connection: Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_no_cart_session: No cart session available. Please refresh the page and try again.
error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
feature_customizable_desc: Hot-swappable switches and customizable keycaps for your perfect typing experience
feature_ergonomic_desc: Split layout and adjustable angles for natural hand positioning and reduced strain
feature_sustainable_desc: Recycled aluminum and eco-friendly packaging for a greener typing experience
featured_products_subtitle: Discover our most popular keyboards and accessories.
features_subtitle: Experience the perfect blend of ergonomics, customization, and sustainability
hero_description: Ergonomic and durable keyboards for creators and professionals. Designed for comfort, built for performance.
order_billed_to_shipping: Billed to the same address as shipping
order_confirmation_email_sent: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.
order_create_account_suggestion: For future orders, consider creating an account to easily track your orders and manage your purchases.
order_email_updates: You'll receive updates about your order status via email.
order_generic_error: An error occurred while processing your order
order_view_in_account: You can also view your order details and track its status in your account.
orders_empty_message: You haven't placed any orders yet
orders_login_message: Please sign in to view your orders
payment_security_text: Your payment information is securely processed and encrypted. We do not store your full card details on our servers.
privacy_data_deletion_message: We will process your request and delete your data from our systems within 30 days.
privacy_deletion_request: You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time by contacting us at {email}.
privacy_gdpr_exercise: You may exercise these rights at any time by contacting us at {email}.
privacy_gdpr_more: For more details on the GDPR, see gdpr-info.eu.
privacy_gdpr_rights: As an Onspry customer, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, or object to the processing of your personal data, as well as the right to data portability, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy_intro: This application collects your name, email address, and profile picture from Facebook when you log in using Facebook OAuth. This information is used solely to create and manage your account, personalize your experience, and enable e-commerce functionality.
privacy_more_info: For more information, please contact us at the email above.
privacy_no_share: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as required to provide our services or comply with the law.
privacy_processing: We collect and process your personal data to provide and improve our services, process orders, manage your account, and communicate with you. Data is processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently, and only for the purposes described in this policy. We do not sell your data to third parties.
product_no_compatible_keycaps: No compatible keycaps found for this switch type.
product_no_compatible_switches: No compatible switches found for this keyboard variant.
register_description: Fill in your details to create a new account.
save_payment_method_text: Save this payment method for future purchases
split_design_description: Ergonomic comfort for extended typing sessions
terms_acceptable_use: You agree not to use our services for any unlawful or prohibited activities, including but not limited to fraud, abuse, or violation of any applicable laws or regulations.
terms_changes: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
terms_contact: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at {email}.
terms_intro: Welcome to Onspry! By using our website and services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms_limitation_liability: Onspry is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid by you for the products or services in question.
terms_orders_payments: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at our discretion. Payment information must be valid and authorized for all purchases.
terms_privacy: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
terms_user_accounts: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
testimonial_subtitle: Understanding the benefits of ergonomic keyboards
validation_first_name_min_length: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation_last_name_min_length: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
verify_email_error_expired: Code expired. A new code has been sent.
verify_email_error_too_many_attempts: Too many attempts. Please try again in {seconds} seconds.
verify_email_error_wait: Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting another code.
verify_email_success_sent: A new verification code has been sent to your email.
